entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
